entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
